## Type of Change

- [ ] `fix:` Bug fix (patch: 5.3.0 → 5.3.1)
- [ ] `feat:` New feature (minor: 5.3.0 → 5.4.0)
- [ ] `breaking:` Breaking change (major: 5.3.0 → 6.0.0)
- [ ] Beta release (add `beta` label)

## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows convention above
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
